dmca.title: AirTran Airways Requests Google Takedown of 2600.com Materials
dmca.body:
Smith, Gambrell & Russell, LLP
ATTORNEYS AT LAW
[private]
ATLANTA, GEORGIA 30309-3592	
Telephone
[private]
	
[private]
Direct Fax No. - [private]
E-Mail - [private]@sgrlaw.com

April 27, 2004

VIA FACSIMILE
CONFIRMATI0N BY FEDEX
AND U.S. MAIL
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: 	AirTran Airways

Copyright Infringement

Dear Sirs:

This firm is counsel to airline carrier AirTran Airways, Inc. ("AirTran") on intellectual property matters. AirTran is the owner of various copyrights in its promotional materials, including but not limited to its artwork, media announcements, and other materials used on its current and former web pages having the domain names "airtran.com" and "valuejet.com." AirTran uses these materials and other intellectual property to advertise and promote its air transportation services, travel agency services and related services which are sold to customers throughout the world. As a result, AirTran's valuable goodwill in its intellectual property extends throughout the world.

It has come to our attention that unauthorized versions of AirTran's web pages dating to September 1997 are presently accessible via the domain name "2600.com." Because AirTran does not operate these web pages nor have any relationship with the owner, operator, or poster of this material, these parties are engaged in the unauthorized and infringing use of AirTran's copyrighted materials. 17 U.S.C.
